name: io.github.kcofoni/pmwiki-mcp
description: MCP server for searching and reading PmWiki pages with text queries and group filtering.

environmentVariables.name: WIKI_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Path to the PmWiki wiki.d directory containing page files (must be mounted as read-only volume in Docker)

io.modelcontextprotocol.registry/publish.author: kcofoni
features: Full-text search across all wiki pages
List all pages or filter by group
Read complete page contents with context snippets
